metadata.title: PetClub
metadata.description: petClub is a site to maintain and improve the quality of life of your pets and animal
metadata.author: amir gheybi

shelter.title: Do you need a pet?
shelter.title2: You can get a pet from the shelter section

Hero.title1: Buy food that is good for your pet

start.content: Welcome. Click the start button to find a pet that fits your needs

1.quest: How much time can you dedicate to your pet each day?

2.quest: How familiar are you with the responsibilities of having a pet?

3.quest: How much do you enjoy participating in outdoor activities with your pet?

4.quest: How much do you care about the cleanliness and tidiness of your home?
4.ans1: Very much, I can't stand messiness
4.ans2: Quite a bit, but I can tolerate some mess
4.ans4: I even like a little messiness

5.quest: Do you or any of your family members have allergies to animals?

6.quest: How sensitive are you to noise?
6.ans1: Very sensitive, I can’t tolerate loud noises
6.ans2: Quite sensitive, but I can tolerate it
6.ans4: I even enjoy the sound of animals

7.quest: How much do you enjoy playing and entertaining your pet?

8.quest: How much is your monthly budget for pet care?

9.quest: How much do you enjoy having a pet in your home environment?

10.quest: How easily can you make changes to your daily routine?
10.ans1: Not at all, I am very organized and dislike changes
10.ans3: Yes, I can easily make changes

hoc.title: pet club
hoc.description: Find the best pet according to your personality and lifestyle by taking the personality test on our site

animal.10-15: It seems you have a busy lifestyle, and a low-maintenance pet like aquarium fish might be suitable for you.
animal.16-25: You could consider adopting pets like birds or hamsters, which require moderate care and attention.
animal.26-35: Your lifestyle is flexible enough for pets like cats, which require attention and affection but have fewer needs compared to dogs.
animal.36-40: You are fully prepared to adopt a highly active and attention-demanding pet like a dog. Your lifestyle allows you to give enough time and attention to your pet.

inpErr.passLength: The password must be at least 8 characters long
inpErr.passCapital: The password must have at least one uppercase English letter
inpErr.passSmall: The password must have at least one lowercase English letter
inpErr.passSpecial: Password must have at least one special character
inpErr.passNumber: The password must have at least one English number
